attr.title: Candle Prick
attr.desc: Candle Prick is a crunchy pixel adventure about stabbing enemies and using them as extensions of yourself to solve increasingly complex puzzles. Simple mechanics will give way to complicated scenarios as you discover different ways to interact with the environment.
attr.inst:
Demo is included and Ready To Run. But if you like the Demo and buy the Full Game from here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1920700/Candle_Prick/
Once youve got it downloaded and installed to your library, right click it, then Manage-Browse Local Files. Then COPY
 "Candle Prick.pck" 
into the gamedata folder, and remove the current, "Candle Prick Patched.pck" Demo file.
If your Games not FullScreen for some reason: Options-Options-Video-Fullscreen.
